text: "The Big Money" is a 1985 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush and is the leading single from their 11th studio album Power Windows. It went to number 45 in the United States and number 4 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. It has also appeared on their compilation albums Retrospective II and The Spirit of Radio: Greatest Hits 1974-1987. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Electronic rock songs Category:Rush (band) songs
title: The Big Money
